forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun stretches across Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth envelops the city, reaching heights near a comfortable 70 degrees. With the breeze flowing in from the west-southwest at a brisk 18 mph, residents find the day both vibrant and invigorating. The sky, a clear blue tapestry, allows the landmarks of the city, including the Golden Gate Bridge, to stand out in sharp relief against the horizon, promising a delightful transition into the evening.

As night approaches, however, patches of drizzle are poised to make an appearance late in the evening, accompanied by a soft blanket of clouds that will descend, cooling the air to a balmy 59 degrees. While the chance of precipitation lingers at a modest 20%, it may still alter plans for outdoor activities. Dressing for the day would require layers, perhaps a light jacket for those evening strolls by the waterfront, where the air will take on a more refreshing quality. As the sun dips below the horizon, consider enjoying a peaceful walk along the Embarcadero or finding solace in one of the city's vibrant cafés, where the warmth of conversation contrasts the cool evening air.
